fields.description: Integrate the new tag editor directive into the Image Detail page.

attachment.filename: Image details requires unique tag names.png
Tag value is optional in AWS.png

comments.body: I don't know what the "new tag editor directive" is, [~ashamblin]. Will you please tell me what you would like me to verify?

[~lnajjar] Please verify that the tag editor on the Image Detail page will display, add and remove tags.

From the Dashboard, click on the Images icon on the left nav.
Choose an image from the list to view.
On the image detail page, find the tag editor.
Add, remove and display tags.
Please watch for anomalous behavior as this does introduce new code.

Thanks.

Looks great!

One minor tweak... In AWS, tag value is optional (see attachment):

 !Tag value is optional in AWS.png|thumbnail! 

Your code makes it a required field (see attachment). !Tag value as required field.png|thumbnail! 

Could you please change tag value to an optional field?

Tag value is optional in AWS.

[~ashamblin] noted that making tag values optional is covered by GUI-1069.

[~lnajjar] Making the value optional is not a small tweak, and is covered in a separate ticket:

https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/browse/GUI-1069

Will not be making this change for this ticket.

Verified on Macintosh running Chrome Version 47.0.2526.80 (64-bit), Firefox 42.0, and Safari 9.0.2.

UX review passed. Ready for code review.
Took it back because, due to code integration problems, it is now dependent on GUI-2277 which breaks it.

Now works.

Verified on Macintosh running Chrome Version 47.0.2526.80 (64-bit), Firefox 42.0, and Safari 9.0.2.

UX review passed. Ready for code review.
 !Image details requires unique tag names.png|thumbnail!
[~ashamblin]: We'll need a new PR for this since PR 1742 is against GUI-2277, which no longer exists since the PR for that ticket (PR 1741) was merged yesterday.
